Literature.Title: Lumazine peptides penilumamides B-D and the cyclic pentapeptide asperpeptide A from a gorgonian-derived Aspergillus sp. fungus.
Literature.Author: Chen M, Shao CL, Fu XM, She ZG, Kong CJ, Wang CY
